author: Marcus Cho
title: Jerry Lorenzo Teases Sporty New Fear of God â€œBasketball Sneakerâ€
text:
Jerry Lorenzoâ€™s â€œMilitary Sneakerâ€ was his first-ever footwear silhouette, and was well-received within the luxury community as its rugged aesthetics filled a niche that desperately needed more. Now, the Fear of God designer has debuted his second sneaker in form of the simply named â€œBasketball Sneaker.â€
The silhouette seems to take after the classic Nike Dunk/Jordan 1 model, as perforations on the toebox and premium leather upper are shaped similarly. On the contrary however, a chunky midsole and rugged outsole offer a tougher feel, while the look is wrapped up with contrasting tones of black and white all over.
The sneakers look to be part of Fear of Godâ€™s upcoming fifth collection; stay tuned for further updates concerning the â€œBasketball Sneaker.â€
